Potions and Elixirs.name: Healing Potion
Potions and Elixirs.desc: A vial of rejuvenating liquid that swiftly restores a portion of the drinker's vitality, providing a precious lifeline in dire situations.
Potions and Elixirs.properties: Restores a moderate amount of health instantly.

Potions and Elixirs.name: Potion of Invisibility
Potions and Elixirs.desc: A vial containing a shimmering potion that bestows temporary invisibility, enabling stealthy maneuvers and evasion.
Potions and Elixirs.properties: Grants temporary invisibility, allowing the user to move undetected.

Potions and Elixirs.name: Potion of Fire Resistance
Potions and Elixirs.desc: A potion that grants temporary protection against the searing heat of flames, bolstering the drinker's resilience to fire-based attacks.
Potions and Elixirs.properties: Provides temporary resistance to fire damage and immunity to fire-based conditions.

Potions and Elixirs.name: Potion of Strength
Potions and Elixirs.desc: A concoction that temporarily enhances the imbiber's physical might, empowering them with increased brawn and fortitude.
Potions and Elixirs.properties: Temporarily increases the user's physical strength and carrying capacity.

Scrolls.name: Scroll of Identify
Scrolls.desc: An inscribed parchment that imparts the ability to discern the arcane nature of items, unraveling their hidden potential.
Scrolls.properties: Allows the reader to identify magical properties of items.

Scrolls.name: Scroll of Mage Armor
Scrolls.desc: A scroll containing an incantation that conjures a protective ethereal barrier around the reader, enhancing their defense.
Scrolls.properties: Conjures a shimmering barrier that enhances the reader's defense against attacks.

Scrolls.name: Scroll of Dimension Door
Scrolls.desc: An ancient script detailing a mystical transportation spell, enabling the reader to traverse short distances instantaneously.
Scrolls.properties: Allows the reader to instantly teleport to a nearby location.

Weapons and Armor.name: Longsword
Weapons and Armor.desc: A versatile and well-balanced one-handed weapon, favored by adventurers for its adaptability in close combat.
Weapons and Armor.properties: A well-balanced one-handed sword suitable for various combat situations.

Weapons and Armor.name: Shortbow
Weapons and Armor.desc: A ranged weapon capable of launching projectiles with precision, providing a means to engage foes from a distance.
Weapons and Armor.properties: Allows the user to shoot arrows with accuracy and range.

Weapons and Armor.name: Leather Armor
Weapons and Armor.desc: Supple and lightweight armor that offers moderate protection without hindering agility.
Weapons and Armor.properties: Lightweight and flexible armor that provides moderate protection.

Weapons and Armor.name: Chain Mail
Weapons and Armor.desc: A sturdy suit of interlocking metal rings, providing solid defense while maintaining mobility.
Weapons and Armor.properties: Durable armor made of interlocking metal rings that offers good defense and mobility.

Magical Items.name: Ring of Protection
Magical Items.desc: A magical ring that envelops the wearer in a subtle shield, augmenting their armor class and fortifying their defenses.
Magical Items.properties: Creates an invisible shield around the wearer, enhancing their armor class and resistance to attacks.

Magical Items.name: Amulet of Health
Magical Items.desc: An enchanted amulet that bestows improved vitality upon the wearer, bolstering their constitution and hit points.
Magical Items.properties: Enhances the wearer's health, granting additional hit points and vitality.

Magical Items.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
Magical Items.desc: A finely crafted cloak that grants the wearer an uncanny ability to blend into shadows and move with remarkable stealth.
Magical Items.properties: Allows the wearer to blend into shadows and move silently, enhancing their stealth capabilities.

Traps and Tools.name: Thieves' Tools
Traps and Tools.desc: A meticulously crafted set of tools essential for adeptly picking locks, disarming traps, and executing stealthy maneuvers.
Traps and Tools.properties: Includes a set of tools used for lock-picking, trap-disarming, and other covert activities.

Traps and Tools.name: Bear Trap
Traps and Tools.desc: A menacing contraption designed to ensnare unsuspecting creatures, immobilizing them with its powerful jaws.
Traps and Tools.properties: A spring-loaded trap that clamps down on creatures, immobilizing them until released.

Traps and Tools.name: Tripwire Alarm
Traps and Tools.desc: A cunningly deployed mechanism triggered by movement, emitting an alerting signal to thwart potential intruders.
Traps and Tools.properties: Emits an audible alarm when triggered by movement, alerting nearby individuals.

Treasure and Valuables.name: Gold Coins
Treasure and Valuables.desc: Gleaming currency recognized throughout realms, serving as a universal medium for trade and acquisition.
Treasure and Valuables.properties: Standard currency used for trade and acquisition of goods and services.

Treasure and Valuables.name: Gemstones
Treasure and Valuables.desc: Precious and alluring gems that hold substantial monetary value, as well as potential applications in magical rituals.
Treasure and Valuables.properties: Valuable gemstones that can be traded or used in magical rituals.

Treasure and Valuables.name: Art Objects
Treasure and Valuables.desc: Elegantly crafted paintings, sculptures, and artistic creations that showcase opulence and artistic prowess, often sought after by collectors.
Treasure and Valuables.properties: Exquisite art pieces that demonstrate craftsmanship and luxury, sought after by collectors.

Treasure and Valuables.name: Pouch of Gems
Treasure and Valuables.desc: A tiny sack containing scattered gems throughout the map, valuable as trade items or components for magical rituals.

Treasure and Valuables.name: Gem of Seeing
Treasure and Valuables.desc: A gem that allows truesight out to 120 feet when you peer through the gem.

Key Items.name: Ornate Key
Key Items.desc: A finely detailed key designed for a specific lock, granting access to secured areas or revealing hidden chambers.
Key Items.properties: Unlocks specific locks or reveals concealed passages and compartments.

Key Items.name: Rune Stone
Key Items.desc: An intricately engraved stone that acts as a catalyst for activating enigmatic portals, bridging distant locations.
Key Items.properties: Activates mysterious portals, allowing instantaneous travel across distances.

Key Items.name: Puzzle Box
Key Items.desc: An enigmatic container concealing intricate mechanisms, secrets, or vital clues, requiring intellectual finesse to unlock its mysteries.
Key Items.properties: Holds complex mechanisms or crucial clues, challenging the mind to unlock its secrets.

Dungeoneering Supplies.name: Rope and Grappling Hook
Dungeoneering Supplies.desc: Essential tools for navigating treacherous terrain, facilitating climbing, descents, and strategic movement.
Dungeoneering Supplies.properties: Aids in climbing, rappelling, and traversing difficult terrain during explorations.

Dungeoneering Supplies.name: Lantern
Dungeoneering Supplies.desc: A reliable source of illumination that pierces through the darkness, banishing obscurity and revealing hidden passages.
Dungeoneering Supplies.properties: Provides steady illumination, dispelling darkness and revealing hidden details.

Dungeoneering Supplies.name: Rations
Dungeoneering Supplies.desc: Nourishing sustenance vital for sustaining adventurers during perilous journeys and arduous quests.
Dungeoneering Supplies.properties: Provides nourishment to adventurers, sustaining them during their travels and quests.

Cursed Items.name: Cursed Dagger
Cursed Items.desc: A malevolent blade imbued with a sinister curse, inflicting detrimental effects upon its wielder.
Cursed Items.properties: Carries a malevolent curse that harms the wielder with each strike.

Cursed Items.name: Haunted Amulet
Cursed Items.desc: An innocuous-looking amulet that unwittingly attracts malevolent spirits, potentially subjecting the bearer to eerie encounters.
Cursed Items.properties: Attracts and binds malevolent spirits, leading to eerie and unsettling experiences for the bearer.

Cursed Items.name: Haunted Mirrors
Cursed Items.desc: Mirrors that reveal unsettling reflections or transport players to parallel dimensions.

Cursed Items.name: Mysterious Scroll
Cursed Items.desc: A cryptic scroll holding unpredictable magical energies, bestowing unexpected outcomes when invoked.
Cursed Items.properties: Contains chaotic magical energies that produce unpredictable effects when activated.

Quest-related Items.name: Strange Relic
Quest-related Items.desc: An enigmatic artifact intertwined with an ongoing quest, harboring clues, significance, or a connection to an overarching narrative.
Quest-related Items.properties: Connected to a larger quest, holding clues or significance in the unfolding story.

Quest-related Items.name: Holy Symbol
Quest-related Items.desc: A revered emblem crucial for conducting sacred rituals and engaging in divine interactions, pivotal for devout characters.
Quest-related Items.properties: Used as a focus in sacred rituals and to communicate with deities, important to devout characters.

Quest-related Items.name: Missing Heirloom
Quest-related Items.desc: A sought-after item essential to fulfilling the task of a noble patron or unraveling a complex storyline, bearing relevance to the adventure's trajectory.
Quest-related Items.properties: Central to a task or storyline, sought after by patrons or crucial for uncovering secrets in the narrative.

Quest-related Items.name: Mystic Obelisks
Quest-related Items.desc: Tall, mysterious obelisks that may grant blessings or curses to those who interact with them.

Quest-related Items.name: Time-worn Tomes
Quest-related Items.desc: Old books scattered throughout the map, containing forgotten knowledge, spells, or quests for players to discover.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Blade of the Archmage
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: A powerful sword that can channel the arcane energy of its wielder, allowing them to cast potent spells and deal extra magical damage with each strike.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: Channels wielder's arcane energy, casts spells, and deals extra magical damage.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Dragonheart Shield
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: A shield crafted from the scale of an ancient dragon, providing resistance to dragon breath attacks and granting the wielder the ability to breathe a cone of elemental energy.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: Resists dragon breath attacks, grants elemental breath ability.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Sword of Kas
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: A sentient and malevolent sword once wielded by the lich Vecna's lieutenant, Kas. The blade is capable of slaying gods and granting its wielder immense power.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: Grants the wielder the ability to deal tremendous damage and cast powerful spells. It can sever limbs and absorb souls.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Deck of Many Things
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: A deck of cards, each representing a different magical effect. When drawn, the cards can bring about both incredible boons and catastrophic consequences.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: Drawing cards from the deck can result in gaining immense wealth, experiencing sudden shifts in alignment, summoning powerful entities, or losing everything.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: The Hand and Eye of Vecna
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: These are the severed and preserved hand and eye of the powerful lich Vecna. When attached to a character, they grant incredible abilities, but at the cost of corrupting the user.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: The Hand grants immense strength and allows the casting of spells, while the Eye provides clairvoyant abilities and access to powerful magic.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Talisman of Pure Good and Talisman of Ultimate Evil
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: These are two opposite artifacts, each capable of vanquishing creatures of extreme alignment. The Talisman of Pure Good can obliterate evil beings, and the Talisman of Ultimate Evil can do the same to good beings.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: These talismans can be used to unleash a devastating energy blast that eradicates creatures of opposing alignment.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Staff of the Magi
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: A powerful staff that enhances the spellcasting abilities of its wielder. It also offers protection against magic and the ability to absorb spells.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: Enhances spellcasting abilities, provides spell absorption, and grants various magical protections.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Vorpal Sword
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: A blade of legendary power that can instantly sever the head of a creature on a critical hit, killing even the mightiest foes in a single blow.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: On a critical hit, this sword can instantly slay the target if it fails a saving throw.

Epic and Legendary Items.name: Ring of Three Wishes
Epic and Legendary Items.desc: A ring that grants its wearer the ability to make three wishes. These wishes can have a wide range of effects, from restoring health to altering reality.
Epic and Legendary Items.properties: Allows the user to make three wishes, but the nature of the wishes can have unintended consequences.
